# WattsUp? PRO device information
# Captured using the "testlibusb -v" example program in libusb

Dev (bus 2, device 2): FTDI - FT232R USB UART
  - Serial Number: A5015A7F
  Configuration:
    wTotalLength:         32
    bNumInterfaces:       1
    bConfigurationValue:  1
    iConfiguration:       0
    bmAttributes:         a0h
    MaxPower:             45
    Interface:
      bInterfaceNumber:   0
      bAlternateSetting:  0
      bNumEndpoints:      2
      bInterfaceClass:    255
      bInterfaceSubClass: 255
      bInterfaceProtocol: 255
      iInterface:         2
      Endpoint:
        bEndpointAddress: 81h
        bmAttributes:     02h
        wMaxPacketSize:   64
        bInterval:        0
        bRefresh:         0
        bSynchAddress:    0
      Endpoint:
        bEndpointAddress: 02h
        bmAttributes:     02h
        wMaxPacketSize:   64
        bInterval:        0
        bRefresh:         0
        bSynchAddress:    0
